name: Dell E7280
productDesc: A portable 12.5 business laptop with Intel 7th Gen Core i5/i7, 8GB/16GB DDR4 RAM, and fast SSD storage for reliable on-the-go productivity.

name: Samsung S24 Ultra
productDesc: A premium smartphone with AMOLED 2X display, powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3. 200MP main camera, 12GB RAM, and a 5000mAh battery.

name: CASIO G-shock watch
productDesc: Reliable and durable timepieces, often featuring digital or analog displays, water resistance, stopwatch, and alarm functions.

name: MacBook Pro
productDesc: high-performance laptop. A stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, up to 128GB memory, and the speed of Apple's M-series chips in aluminum design.

name: earBuds 3s Pro
productDesc: wireless earbuds powered by the Apple H1/H2 chip for instant pairing. Feature Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking (3rd Gen) and offer up to 6 hours listening time on a single charge.

name: headphones
productDesc: Immersive sound. Over-ear, on-ear, or in-ear designs, featuring wired or wireless connectivity, noise cancellation, and a typical frequency response of 20Hz-20kHz for rich audio.
